title: So my showdown shop luck wasn't too hot, how about you?
body:
I got 3 Lee Sin skins, a nidalee skin and a vi skin. Firstly, I have played 1 Lee Sin game in like months (got a quadra, but it was a normal), same for vi. And for both nidalee and vi I already own the only skin I could want. 

My %70 sale was on muay Thai Lee, which just has such a bad reputation as a skin I don't want to use it lol, and the rest of the discounts were %40 off or less. 

So, all in all, not the best, but not the worst. I really can't complain about discounts even if I probably won't use them. 

I'm interested to know how everyone else's went, comment below and make me jealous!

replies.body:
I got a bunch of skins that I don't like and/or dislike/hate the champ they belong to (2/6 were Ashe skins, who I don't play, one was Riven, who I find incredibly boring and played like, three games ever on). One was a Syndra skin I hate (and I bought Snowday anyway). One was a Nidalee skin (the only one I'm even interested in), and the last is a Vi skin that I both don't really like and don't play Vi enough to justify a skin for her. : /

I know they wanted to personalize it all, but I can't help but feel like it was just a big luck thing, just like ranked is. >.>
I got 4 discounts for champions I don't own.

These are the skins that I got:

* High Noon {{champion:157}} at -30%
* Lord {{champion:82}} at -50%
* Defender {{champion:89}} at -60%
* Steel Legion {{champion:86}} at -60%
* Rugged {{champion:86}} at -70%
* Secret Agent {{champion:21}} at -20%

Debating on getting High Noon Yasuo, and Rugged Garen... MAYBE Lord Mordekaiser. Maybe... Very unsure on this due to Challenger Nid coming out at the start of Season 6... And other potential sales to happen during this month. AUGH!

https://i.gyazo.com/1ece0c417a48ed7a63613e3ff7dc5a3c.jpg

Pretty hot. Got what i needed. So im content.
I got 70% off Yi and his Chosen skin... I feel like I just got told I'll shoot my eye our
